  • Method Details

    • normalize

      public double[] normalize​(double[] sentimentalArr) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      This methods normalize the sentimental analysis score by multiplying each sentimental classification by its coefficient. Normalization is required to obtain an accurate result when processing the score through the statistical methods

      Sentimental Coefficent

      • Very Negative: -10
      • Negative: -5
      • Neutral: 0
      • Positive: 5
      • Very Positive: 10
      Parameters:
      sentimentalArr - - double array containing sentimental analysis scores
      Returns:
      the normalized - double array containing sentimental analysis scores
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException
      Since:
      1.0

      The mean score value

    • getModeSentimental

      public java.lang.String getModeSentimental​(double sentimentalMean) throws CustomError

      This method inputs the sentimental mean value and outputs the mode in the form of sentimental type categorization

      Parameters:
      sentimentalMean - - See getMean(double[] normalizedScore) method
      Returns:
      The sentimental mode type
      Throws:
      CustomError - If the mean value is not within the range of -2 to 2, an error occur
      Since:
      1.0

    • printStats

      public Statistics printStats​(double[] sentimentalScore) throws CustomError, java.lang.NullPointerException

      The method return and prints the sentimental summary of the sentimenalScore provided

      Parameters:
      sentimentalScore - - an double array conatining the sentimental scores
      Returns:
      the a statistics object containing the summary statistics information
      Throws:
      CustomError
      java.lang.NullPointerException
      Since:
      1.0
